q: More than a dozen people were also injured. "Progress every day' On Sunday, Senator Kirsten Gillibrand , said Ms Gabrielle Giffords was "doing great" and "making progress every day". She's using both sides of her body. She's able to breathe on her own. She's able to open her eyes and to show people she understands what she's hearing and seeing, Ms Kirsten Gillibrand said on NBC's Meet The Press programme. "It"s an extraordinary amount of progress for a woman who sustained such a horrific injury," she added. Risk contained No

the deal that sent veteran forward Kevin Willis to the Nuggets, Keon Clark quietly stole the show from two of the NBA's top scorers. "We're excited about( Keon Clark )," Toronto coach Lenny Wilkens said. We're trying to work in as quickly as we can, and show him something different every day, and he's just gobbling it up. He's excited about being here and I thought that was just an incredible job he did to step in for( Antonio Davis ). We went to him several times because we wanted him to know we had confidence in him. He did a great job. After helping Toronto eclipse a 20-point first-half deficit, Keon Clark watched helplessly as Allen Iverson fueled a 17-0 Philadelphia burst with 11 points, leaving the Raptors with an 89-78 deficit with 8:47 left in regulation. Today we are seeing our existing customers move to the cloud to address issues of cost and complexity; tomorrow, our work as leaders in innovation will result in new scenarios and workloads... enabled in the cloud. Back in January, Steve Ballmer announced that Muglia's departure would herald the Server and Tools Business' "move forward into the era of cloud computing," one that would apparently require "new leadership.

Brandon Boyd Bond, owner of All or Nothing Tattoo on South Cobb Drive and All or Nothing pit bull rescue, said he and store manager Daron James are introducing the dogs to the world of human love. In August, Michael Vick pleaded guilty to a federal dog-fighting charge, admitting his involvement in a dog-fighting enterprise that killed poorly performing dogs by hanging or drowning. Of course he worries about me every day, and he always has and he always will, Kirsten Gillibrand said. "But we also know this job is about service, it's about helping constituents, and meeting constituents, and being available and having those one-on-one meetings," she said.
